message: I think this is a fair start.  I'm willing to give you a little bit, but I'm sure you'll understand that I want the majority since I'm taking most of the risk in this game.
Considering the inflation impact, I believe a more balanced start is necessary. Open to adjustments.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still taking a bigger share due to the higher inflation rate impacting me more. Let's find a middle ground.
